metadata.description:
194 pages!

Kyle has just settled into his new city and job. Erika, a pretty neighbor, catches his eye. They meet, they talk. Before they know it, they're an "item." Before they know it, in fact, they're very, very together. It's a high but it's frightening. Is it really the right choice? Are they really for each other, or just escaping loneliness?
metadata.name: Flower & Fade
